bio: Brian Bolland is an English comic book artist and illustrator who is known for his work in the fields of comics, concept art, and toy design. He has worked on a wide range of projects, including his own creator-owned series and collaborations with major publishers. Bolland is known for his highly detailed and realistic style, and has been widely praised for his storytelling and artistic merit. He was born in 1951 and has been working as an artist for many years.
